lyrics:
(Ah ah)
I can't believe the news, oh boy
(You should have listened when they're talking)
You're treating me just like a toy
(Must be a rumour around walking)
Don't let go, if you want me
Let me know it's now or never
Don't let go, you will never, ever
Find a love that's better
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
Everytime you're fooling around
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
You really gotta hold on me now
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
Time's up, time's up
If you don't listen, look and stop
(Ah)
Say, did you cheat on me last night?
(There's no need for you to worry)
I cross my heart and hope you're right
(Well, I don't have to say I'm sorry)
Don't let go, if you want me
Let me know it's now or never
Don't let go, you will never, ever
Find a love that's better
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
Everytime you're fooling around
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
You really gotta hold on me now
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
Time's up, time's up
If you don't listen, look and stop
(Ah)
Don't let go, I still want you
And I need you more than ever
Don't let go, you will never, ever
Find a love that's better
Ooooh
(Stop! Look! Listen!)
(You don't know what you're missing)
You will never find any better
(Everytime you're fooling around)
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
Everytime you're fooling around
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
You really gotta hold on me now
Stop! Look! Listen!
You don't know what you're missing
Time's up, time's up
If you don't listen, look and stop
